colour_hdri.process.conversion Module¶

Conversion Process¶

Defines the conversion process objects:

  • convert_raw_files_to_dng_files()
  • convert_dng_files_to_intermediate_files()
colour_hdri.process.conversion.RAW_CONVERTER = u'dcraw'¶

Command line raw conversion application, usually Dave Coffin’s dcraw.

RAW_CONVERTER : unicode

colour_hdri.process.conversion.RAW_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS = u'-t 0 -D -W -4 -T "{0}"'¶

Arguments for the command line raw conversion application for non demosaiced linear tiff file format output.

RAW_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS : unicode

colour_hdri.process.conversion.RAW_D_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS = u'-t 0 -H 1 -r 1 1 1 1 -4 -q 3 -o 0 -T "{0}"'¶

Arguments for the command line raw conversion application for demosaiced linear tiff file format output.

RAW_D_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS : unicode

colour_hdri.process.conversion.DNG_CONVERTER = u'/Applications/Adobe DNG Converter.app/Contents/MacOS/Adobe DNG Converter'¶

Command line dng conversion application, usually Adobe DNG Converter.

DNG_CONVERTER : unicode

colour_hdri.process.conversion.DNG_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS = u'-e -d "{0}" "{1}"'¶

Arguments for the command line dng conversion application.

DNG_CONVERSION_ARGUMENTS : unicode

colour_hdri.process.conversion.convert_raw_files_to_dng_files(raw_files, output_directory)[source]¶

Converts given raw files to dng files using given output directory.

Parameters:
  • raw_files (array_like) – Raw files to convert to dng files.
  • output_directory (unicode) – Output directory.
Returns:

dng files.
Return type:

list
colour_hdri.process.conversion.convert_dng_files_to_intermediate_files(dng_files, output_directory, demosaicing=False)[source]¶

Converts given dng files to intermediate tiff files using given output directory.

Parameters:
  • dng_files (array_like) – dng files to convert to intermediate tiff files.
  • output_directory (str) – Output directory.
  • demosaicing (bool) – Perform demosaicing on conversion.
Returns:

Intermediate tiff files.
Return type:

list
